lead_paragraph: Video assistance for referees could be a reality at next year's World Cup finals despite teething problems when they were tested at the Club World Cup, FIFA President Gianni Infantino said on Friday.
snippet: Video assistance for referees could be a reality at next year's World Cup finals despite teething problems when they were tested at the Club World Cup, FIFA President Gianni Infantino said on Friday....

headline.main: FIFA Chief 'Confident' of Video Officials at World Cup
headline.print_headline: FIFA Chief 'Confident' of Video Officials at World Cup
